跀字的基本解释

跀
yuè
同“刖”。

跀字的汉语字典释义

[①]［yuè］
［《廣韻》魚厥切，入月，疑。］
(1)古代酷刑，断足。《韩非子·外储说左下》：“孔子相衞，弟子子臯爲獄吏，刖人足，所跀者守門。”一说，为斩掉脚趾。参阅《说文·足部》“跀”清段玉裁注。
(2)谓器物倾侧不正。

跀字的康熙字典解释

【酉集中】【足字部】　跀； 康熙笔画：11； 页码：页1222第21
【唐韻】【集韻】?魚厥切，音月。【說文】斷足也。【韓非子·外儲說】孔子相衞，弟子子臯爲獄吏，跀人足。【玉篇】或作刖。【類篇】跀或从兀作?。　又【集韻】五忽切，音兀。又五括切，音抈。義?同。　又與髻通。【周禮·冬官考工記瓬人】髻墾薜暴不入市。【註】髻，讀爲跀。【註】謂器不正敧邪者也。

考證：〔【周禮·冬官考工記旊人】髻墾薜暴不入市。〕　謹照原文旊改瓬。
跀字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
跀字的起名意思

暂无。

Basic explanation of words
Slap
yuè
Same as "刖".
Slap
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［yuè］
["Guangyun" Yu Jue cuts, enters the moon, suspicious. ]
(1) Ancient torture and severed feet. "Han Feizi · Foreign Reserve Says Lower Left": "Confucius defends him, his disciple Gao is a jailer, slashing people's feet, and those who are trampled guard the door." One said, in order to cut off the toes. Refer to "Shuowen·Foot" "stomping" Qing Duan Yucai's note.
(2) It is said that the utensils are tilted incorrectly.
Slap
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Unitary Collection] [Foot Character Department] 　跀; Kangxi Strokes: 11; Page Number: Page 1222-21
[Tang Yun] [Ji Yun]? Yu Jue cut, sound moon. [Said the text] The foot is also broken. [Said by Han Feizi·Foreign Reserve] Confucius was defending, and his disciple Zi Gao was a jailer, stomping people. [Jade articles] Or make a cut. [Classic articles] stomping or starting from Wu?.　[Jiyun] Five sudden cuts, sound Wu. It is five-folded and cut, and the sound is 抈. Righteous? Same.　 and 髻-linked again. [Zhou Li·Dongguan Kao Gong Ji Hu Ren] The bun reclaimed and did not enter the market. [Note] Updo, read as lame. [Note] It is also said that the device is not righteous and evil. Textual research: [[Zhou Li·Dongguan Kaogongji 旊人] 嗊薜薜 could not enter the market. 〕 　 I would like to change it according to the original text.
